Name: castsource
Description: OID of the source data type

Name: casttarget
Description: OID of the target data type

Name: castfunc
Description: The OID of the function to use to perform this cast.\n Zero is stored if the cast method doesn't require a function.

Name: castcontext
Description: Indicates what contexts the cast can be invoked in.\n e means only as an explicit cast (using CAST or :: syntax). a means implicitly in assignment to a target column, as well as explicitly. i means implicitly in expressions, as well as the other cases.

Name: castmethod
Description: Indicates how the cast is performed. f means that the function specified in the\n castfunc field is used. i means that the input/output functions are used. b means that the types are binary-coercible, thus no conversion is required.
